subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Manny Pacquiao dismissed a derogatory online video posted by Floyd Mayweather Jr., calling it an “uneducated message” and choosing to instead focus on his coming fight with Antonio Margarito.
snippet: Manny Pacquiao dismissed a derogatory online video posted by Floyd Mayweather Jr., calling it an “uneducated message” and choosing to instead focus on his coming fight with Antonio Margarito.
